Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/28626 FAB-13598 remove grpc_start_time from logs

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~sykesm please consider a cherry-pick to release-1.4 for v1.4.1, to reduce the chance of people writing log scraping that breaks when moving from v1.4.x to v2.x.
